text: Ibungona nungsijariba ichil inaosa, nakhoigi maramgidamak matam pumnamakta eikhoina Tengban Mapubu thagatchapham thok-i. Maramdi Thawaigi sengdokpibagi mapanna amadi achumba aduda nakhoina thajabagi mapanna aran-khubham phangjanaba nakhoibu Tengban Mapuna ahoubadagi2:13 Ariba manuscript kharada “ahanba mahei oina” haina i. khandokpire.
